name: visitor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 someone who visits a person or place: You have some visitors to see you.
someone who goes to a website on the internet
More examplesFewer examplesThere has been a steady decrease in the number of visitors to the museum.For a few weeks in the summer, visitors are able to go round Buckingham Palace.My mother's having visitors to stay next week.Most foreign visitors to Britain enter the country legitimately.New security measures require all visitors to sign in at reception and wear a visitor's badge.
